summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the Alley in Block Forty-six (46) of Pontius' Second Supplemental Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley from Thomas Street to Harrison Street and between Summit Avenue and Belmont Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and same, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 37498; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
